pages.text: Igloos are small spherical house-like buildings that have a $(l:blocks/bed)bed$(), $(l:blocks/wool)carpets$(), a $(l:blocks/crafting_table)crafting table$() and a $(l:blocks/furnace)furnace$() inside. They come in a $(l:blocks/snow)snow$() variant (in $(l:biomes/taiga)snowy taigas$(), $(l:biomes/plains)tundras$() and $(l:biomes/ice_spikes)ice spikes$() biomes), a $(l:blocks/stone)stone$() variant (in $(l:biomes/mountains)mountain$() environments) and a $(l:blocks/dirt)dirt/grass$() variant (in most other biomes).

Every second igloo contains a secret entrance to an underground lab that contains a $(l:mobs/villager)normal villager$() and a $(l:mobs/zombie)zombie villager$(). The $(l:blocks/chest)chest$() there contains a $(l:items/apple)golden apple$(). If one now were to bring a $(l:effects/potion)weakness potion$(), they could heal the zombie villager.
